about_the_game:
This demo offers a glimpse into Kalyskah's story, giving you a taste of the world we are building and the first steps she takes following the prologue. As we continue transitioning to Unreal Engine 5, expect further gameplay, visuals, and overall experience enhancements.

You might find some issues and inconsistencies in animations or character behaviour. Some of them were caused during the transition from Unreal 4 to Unreal 5, and others are features we are currently working on to improve. Still, we hope you enjoy what we have for you today!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that may not be suitable for all ages. It features mature themes, including nudity and sexual content, with some elements involving BDSM devices. Additionally, there are depictions of alcohol and drug use.

detailed_description:
This demo offers a glimpse into Kalyskah's story, giving you a taste of the world we are building and the first steps she takes following the prologue. As we continue transitioning to Unreal Engine 5, expect further gameplay, visuals, and overall experience enhancements.

You might find some issues and inconsistencies in animations or character behaviour. Some of them were caused during the transition from Unreal 4 to Unreal 5, and others are features we are currently working on to improve. Still, we hope you enjoy what we have for you today!
name: Kalyskah Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
